A guide on how to subscribe to YouTube channels and receive updates via email using RSS feeds.

If you want to Subscribe to a YouTube channel but do not want to follow them.The trick is figuring out how to subscribe to a YouTube channel via email

# What is RSS?

RSS (Really Simple Syndication) is a web feed that allows users and applications to access updates to online content in a standardized, computer-readable format. These feeds can, for example, allow a user to keep track of many different websites in a single news aggregator.

# Step 1: open youtube page of the channel want to subscribe

for example:https://www.youtube.com/@thecoatlessprofessor7674/videos

# Step 2: view page source

![](images/clipboard-8192806.png)

# Step 3: find 'videos.xml' in page source

for example: https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=UColncDCZ8SmTAHYr92QFclQ

# Step 4: Use an RSS-to-Email Tool to Subscribe

using free RSS tool [https://feedrabbit.com](https://feedrabbit.com) and enter your email address to subscribe.
![](images/clipboard-1247030546.png)

# Step 5: open email and activate feedrabbit from a email from feedrabbit

When there is a new video you will get a email.

you can also view all subscribe at [https://feedrabbit.com/subscriptions](https://feedrabbit.com/subscriptions)
